nodes.description: 伊斯兰国 Amaq 新闻机构发布了一张照片，显示负责斯里兰卡复活节周日一系列爆炸事件的八名恐怖分子。
nodes.support_text: Earlier today, the Islamic State’s Amaq News Agency released this photo showing the eight terrorists responsible for a series of bombings in Sri Lanka on Easter Sunday.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国发布了三条声明和一段视频，声称对斯里兰卡复活节周日的爆炸事件负责。
nodes.support_text: The Islamic State has released three statements and a video claiming responsibility for the bombings in Sri Lanka on Easter Sunday.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国首次发布了一条简短声明，没有提供关于行动的细节，称一个安全“消息人士”告诉该组织的媒体部门，所谓的哈里发国的“战士”实施了袭击。
nodes.support_text: The first, a terse statement by Amaq News Agency, offered no details about the operation, saying simply that a security “source” told the group’s media arm that the so-called caliphate’s “fighters” had carried out the attacks.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国随后发布了一条更长的声明，称有 1,000 人死亡或受伤，强调基督徒是袭击的预定目标。
nodes.support_text: The Islamic State subsequently released a longer statement, saying that 1,000 people were killed or injured in the orchestrated assault.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国还发布了一条第三条声明，包括一张照片，显示八名被指控的罪犯站在该组织通常飘扬的旗帜前。
nodes.support_text: The Islamic State also released a third statement, including a photo of the eight alleged perpetrators standing in front of the flag typically flown by the group.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国发布了一段视频，显示八名罪犯在恐怖行动之前向阿布·贝克尔·阿尔-巴格达迪宣誓效忠。
nodes.support_text: Amaq has also posted a video showing the eight perpetrators, led by Hashim, swearing allegiance to Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi before their day of terror.

nodes.description: 斯里兰卡当局指认扎哈兰·哈希姆为首要嫌疑人，称他的组织，国家Thuweeth Jama'ath (NTJ)，可能实施了袭击。
nodes.support_text: Sri Lankan authorities fingered Hashim as the prime suspect early on, saying that his group, National Thowheeth Jama’ath (or National Thowheed Jamaath, NTJ), likely carried out the assault.

nodes.description: 斯里兰卡警方官员在一周多前警告说，哈希姆和 NTJ 计划袭击教堂，这一警告来自“外国情报”来源。
nodes.support_text: In fact, a Sri Lankan police official warned more than a week before the bombings that Hashim and NTJ were planning to assault churches.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国发布声明，提供了几个炸弹手的别名。
nodes.support_text: The Islamic State released a statement providing aliases for several of the bombers.

nodes.description: 八个人中只有一个是未戴面具的，这个人看起来像是扎哈兰·哈希姆，一个在在线视频中传播仇恨信息的热情意识形态者。
nodes.support_text: Only one of the eight is unmasked. That individual, seen in the middle, appears to be Zahran Hashim, a fiery ideologue who spread his hateful message in online videos.

nodes.description: Amaq 发布了类似的视频，显示恐怖分子在袭击前宣誓效忠。
nodes.support_text: Amaq has disseminated similar videos after a series of attacks in the past.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国发布影像，旨在强调巴格达迪的忠实信徒是责任人的想法。
nodes.support_text: The footage is intended to underscore the idea that Baghdadi’s loyalists were responsible.

nodes.description: 阿马克的视频表明肇事者与伊斯兰国的网络之间存在至少一种数字联系。
nodes.support_text: Amaq’s videos demonstrate that there is at least a digital tie between the perpetrators and the Islamic State’s network.

nodes.description: 报告指出，这些袭击可能针对天主教教堂和科伦坡的印度高等委员会。
nodes.support_text: The reports noted that these attacks could target Catholic churches and the Indian High Commission in Colombo.

nodes.description: 警告没有传达到高级政府官员
nodes.support_text: The warning was not passed along to senior government officials.
